name: Frogis FI-CS2W
headline: Ultra-compact ceiling speaker
description: Ultra-compact ceiling speaker for discreet background music and paging.
heroCopy: A tiny ceiling footprint with clear speech and background music.
story: FI-CS2W is designed for fast installation and discreet integration. Its compact form factor delivers intelligible speech and balanced background music while supporting both 70V/100V line and low-impedance systems.
definition: Ultra-compact full-range ceiling loudspeaker for distributed audio systems.

name: Frogis FI-CS3
headline: 3-inch magnetic ceiling speaker
description: Compact 3-inch ceiling speaker with magnetic grille.
heroCopy: Clean architectural integration with magnetic precision.
story: FI-CS3 combines a neodymium driver with a magnetic grille for fast installation and refined appearance.

name: Frogis FI-CS4W
headline: Two-way ceiling speaker
description: Two-way ceiling speaker for clear speech and balanced music.
heroCopy: Improved clarity through a dedicated tweeter.
story: FI-CS4W introduces a two-way architecture to enhance intelligibility and music detail.
definition: Two-way ceiling loudspeaker for commercial installations.

name: Frogis FI-CS5W
headline: Two-way ceiling speaker
description: 5-inch two-way ceiling speaker for wider coverage.
heroCopy: A balanced upgrade for larger spaces.
story: FI-CS5W scales output and coverage while maintaining clean architectural integration.
definition: Two-way ceiling loudspeaker for medium-sized spaces.

name: Frogis FI-CS6W
headline: Two-way ceiling speaker
description: High-output 6-inch ceiling speaker for demanding environments.
story: FI-CS6W delivers higher SPL and improved low-frequency response.

name: Frogis FI-CS8W
headline: Two-way ceiling speaker
description: Large-format ceiling speaker with extended low-frequency response.
story: FI-CS8W is designed for large spaces requiring strong coverage and presence.

name: Frogis FI-CS6D
headline: Two-way ceiling speaker with Dante
description: Networked ceiling speaker with Dante audio.
story: FI-CS6D integrates Dante networking for flexible, scalable installations.

name: Frogis FI-CS8D
headline: Two-way ceiling speaker with Dante
description: High-output Dante ceiling speaker for large spaces.
story: FI-CS8D combines large-format acoustics with Dante audio networking.

name: Frogis FI-CS6BT
headline: Bluetooth active ceiling speaker
description: All-in-one Bluetooth ceiling speaker with built-in amplification.
heroCopy: Wireless audio, built into the ceiling.
story: FI-CS6BT integrates Bluetooth and amplification for simple, cable-free installs.

name: Frogis FI-CSUB6P
headline: In-ceiling subwoofer
description: Compact ceiling subwoofer for low-frequency reinforcement.
heroCopy: Hidden bass support for distributed systems.
story: FI-CSUB6P extends low-end performance while remaining completely concealed.

name: Frogis FI-HPS5
headline: Hanging pendant loudspeaker
story: FI-HPS5 delivers wide dispersion in open architectural environments.

name: Frogis FI-HPS6
headline: Hanging pendant loudspeaker
description: High-output pendant speaker for large open spaces.
story: FI-HPS6 scales output for demanding public venues.
